content: for large/x-large row 18 chain 2 double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in 2nd double_crochet from hook 3 double_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in chain-2 space across 2 double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in chain-1 space 2 double_crochet in last st turn row 19 chain 2 2 double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in 2nd double_crochet from hook 3 double_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in chain-2 space across 3 double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in chain-1 space 2 double_crochet in last st turn row 20 chain 2 2 double_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in 2nd double_crochet from hook 3 double_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in chain-2 space across 3 double_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in chain-1 space 2 double_crochet in last st turn continuing sleeve row for small/medium large/x-large row 18-20 21-23 3 double_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in chain-2 space across 2 double_crochet in last st turn row 21-22 24-25 3 double_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in chain-2 space across 3 double_crochet in last chain-2 space turn row 23-30 26-33 3 double_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in chain-2 space across 2 double_crochet in last st turn row 31-32 34-35 3 double_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in chain-2 space across 3 double_crochet in last chain-2 space turn row 33-43 36-44 3 double_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in chain-2 space across 2 double_crochet in last st turn row 44-45 45-46 3 double_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in chain-2 space across 3 double_crochet in last chain-2 space turn row 46-51 47-51 3 double_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in chain-2 space across 2 double_crochet in last st turn fasten_off and weave in ends finishing with wrong sides together sew shoulder seams of the front right and left to the corresponding shoulders of the back sew the side seams for each sleeve fold right sides together and sew the seam please note you may wish to backstitch across the decreases along the sleeve to create a straight seam turn right side out set sleeve into the body of the jacket lining up the side and arm seams sew around the armhole repeat for second sleeve turn body of jacket right side out sew 3 buttons evenly spaced to the left front of sweater approximately 4 5 apart and 1 from the left edge use the chain-2 spaces on the right front opposite the buttons as buttonholes chest opening and neck finishing using middle sized hook join yarn to bottom right front near at the hem chain 1 single_crochet in same stitch as joining single_crochet evenly around the chest and neck opening fasten_off and weave in ends the neckline is complete if you do not want the collar collar note do not chain at the beginning of each row with middle sized hook join yarn to row 20 of right front row 1 chain 1 single_crochet in same stitch as joining single_crochet in each single_crochet around to row 20 of left front slip_stitch turn row 2 slip_stitch in next 3 st single_crochet around slip_stitch in fourth single_crochet from end of row 1 miss last 3 st of row 1 turn row 3-7 slip_stitch
